name: Kitsune (FireFox2021)
description:
Check us out on Behance!

You are a fox seeking to uncover the secrets of your Herculean ancestors. Explore this mountaintop lost to time and gather the story of what happened in times past.

Long ago there lived a race of gigantic foxes. One day, they fell into civil war, and were quelled only by the sign of divine ascension. Through the power of embers, they made their way into the heavens, leaving behind their lands. Untouched for eons, these mountains slumbered, until one day a traveler in their image decides for itself to follow in its ancestor’s footsteps. 

Download our game for the best experience!
